channel.title: IRC Suggestion ( Demand really )
channel.description:
Some of you may remember back on Freenode IRC We had a bot made by Kamu called Moparisdongs. Personally I'd rarther had Moparisdongs back than any little shitty chanserv bot like Nintendo. If Kamu agrees to run the bot, would someone with an high enough rank on the IRC, mainly Moparisthebest be willing to give Moparisdongs rights on the channel ?
If you want post your views on this suggestion here also.
<3 Cowie`

item.title: IRC Suggestion ( Demand really )
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:25, topic:170144”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=229998.msg1976692#msg1976692 date=1199501929]
Gikid fails.

imo why don’t we let cowie’ write a bot script, hes a pretty good coder
[/quote]
Because Cowie` can’t keep himself off the servers gline list, and we all <3 moparisdongs.[/quote]

Why do you have to bring the GLines into play ? I haven’t been GLined in like a week.

[quote=“Kamu, post:31, topic:170144”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=229998.msg1974075#msg1974075 date=1199411076]

I’d be happy to bring it back in if someone can think of some handy scripts it could run. I’d like to link it somehow to the forum.
I’d also like to ask any fuckhead OPs to refrain from kickbanning it because they personally don’t like it and think what they want is the best for everyone.

How do you imagine linking it to the forum? Sounds intriguing. I don’t have a problem with bringing it back in as long as it either a) has no OP powers or b) follows the chanserv access list
[/quote]

I have no idea at the moment. Problem is, most IRC users (myself included) despise the forums and couldn’t careless about what happens on them (spam & flame). So the chances of linking the two are very low.

If anyone has any good ideas that would warrant bringing dongs back, you know where to find me.[/quote]

Just bring dongs back as a " fun " bot, without any power. As long as some nazistork, doesn’t ban it.

Read full topic
